lead_paragraph: South Africa captain Adriaan Strauss will end his international career on Saturday when he leads his beleaguered team out for the last time in their final test of the year against Wales.

headline.print_headline: Strauss Seeks to Avoid Unwanted South Africa Legacy
headline.main: Strauss Seeks to Avoid Unwanted South Africa Legacy

snippet: South Africa captain Adriaan Strauss will end his international career on Saturday when he leads his beleaguered team out for the last time in their final test of the year against Wales....
